Author: Mei
Name: Oh Hey!
Description:
This plugin notifies you when someone targets you, or emotes at you.

Commands:
  /ohhey - Opens the main window
  /ohhey main - Opens the main window
  /ohhey [config|settings] - Opens the settings window
  /ohhey help - Displays the help message (will also display on invalid sub-commands)
Punchline: Ever wanted to get notified when someone targets you or emotes at you? Now you can!
